snippet: Montblanc’s TimeWalker Extreme Chronograph DLC has a leather band that is resistant to scratches, fire and water.
abstract: Montblanc’s TimeWalker Extreme Chronograph DLC has a leather band that is resistant to scratches, fire and water.
lead_paragraph: In this weekly series, the men’s fashion editors of T invite creative personalities to put their own aesthetic spin on a new watch. Here, the illustrator Jay Riggio captures a timepiece from Montblanc.

headline.main: A Timepiece Designed to Withstand the Elements
